Articles.Content:
Whackjob... Here we go again with your incrediable CPU melting creations. You should get a custom title for this madness you continue to make.
Hahahaha, I never designed ship with a part count that is incredibly large. I just don't have patience to design that kind of ship, combined with overwhelming my lovely computer(it overheats badly and my computer can't handle huge part count since it will cause extreme lag at launchpad). Anyway, I love this madness when it comes to the extremity and beyond the current limit.
